div.h2:
WELCOME TO NORTH PIKE SCHOOL DISTRICT!
It is the mission of the North Pike School District to provide a quality educational climate that enables all students to develop to their fullest potential.

span.span:
School Attendance Awareness Month Competition
Strive for 5:
Reading at Grade Level by 3rd Grade

div.p:
To our parents, we thank you for sending your best to us everyday so that together we can help grow them into good and smart people - North Pike School District has a long tradition of providing a quality educational climate that enables all students to develop to their fullest potential.
Please let us know how we can better serve you. You may contact any of our staff at the number provided at the bottom of this page. Thank you.

h3.style: font-size: 26px; font-family: lusitanaregular; border-bottom-color: rgb(155, 221, 255); color: rgb(20, 31, 62); border-bottom-width: 3px; border-bottom-style: solid; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding-bottom: 5px;

div.p: North Pike School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. North Pike School District also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
